name: Gravity Desura
description:
This is a short 2D Platformer that was made in the style of the old NES games.

Give it a try and tell me what you liked and didn't like.  All feedback is welcome.

Also if you manage to beat the game on HARD MODE!!!!  then you will gain 10 years of good luck.  Definitely not a lie.

Anyways, hope you have fun.

Credits: Fitz the Fox Desura, which was the primary inspiration for this game.

Additional Info: The video attached to this page is played on an older beta version and thus will be different from the game downloaded from this page.
